mapper.sql: LEAVE_ID, USER_ID, USERNAME, LEAVE_BEGIN_DATE, LEAVE_END_DATE, BEGIN_DATE_TYPE, END_DATE_TYPE, REMARK, AUTH_STATUS, APPLY_TIME, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from oa_leave
order by ${orderByClause}
